full_summary:
**RFQ Canadian Government Cheque Delivery Transportation Service**
=====================================================

**Tender Reference**
-------------------

WS4361693203-Doc4365595944

**Status**
----------

* English: This tender is expired.
* French: Ce dossier d'appel est expiré.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Title**: Canadian Government Cheque Delivery Transportation Service
* **UNSPSC Code**: 78102203
* **Description**: Mailing or mail pick up or delivery services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Bidder Information**
---------------------

To secure the government contract for providing cheque delivery transportation services, bidders must submit a proposal that includes:

* Guaranteed delivery to PSPC offices in Matane or Symcor, both located in Montreal

**Contractor Information**
-----------------------

The government agency leading this procurement initiative is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For questions or administrative inquiries, please reach out to:

* Ashley Kazda (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [ashley.kazda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ashley.kazda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Timeline**
------------

* **Notice Publication Date**: December 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024

**Proposal Requirements**
-------------------------

Please submit your proposal, along with any supporting documentation, by February 15, 2024. All proposals submitted after 14:00 HNE on this date will be non-responsive.

**Documentation and Addenda**
-----------------------------

For additional information, please refer to the procurement specifications. Attachment files are not included with this tender notice.

**Url**
-----

Please visit the following link to access the full tender documentation:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18346658?extsite=MTgzNDY2NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
